comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Removed the extra dependencies in revision 389904.

Merged to 1.0 in revision 389906.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Removed the cqfs dependencies also from jca in revision 389922. Merged to 1.0 in revision 389923.

comments.author: Marcel Reutegger
comments.body:
Configuration still references CQFS filesystem in repository.xml.

I suggest we configure the derby persistence manager and add the derby library as dependency.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Resolved in revision 391024 by replacing the CQFileSystem configuration with LocalFileSystem.

I didn't configure the Derby file system or persistence manager to avoid extra changes.

description: There's still unneeded dependencies to the cqfs libraries in jcr-server/webapp and jca.
